article_text: You’ve probably heard the term “crony capitalism” used quite a bit lately. From the Export-Import Bank to government bailouts, there’s no shortage of examples. In a new video from PragerU, Weekly Standard staff writer Jay Cost explains why you should care about it—and what can be done to stop it.

You’ve probably heard the term “crony capitalism” used quite a bit lately.
In a new video from PragerU, Weekly Standard staff writer Jay Cost explains why you should care about it—and what can be done to stop it.
From the Export-Import Bank to government bailouts, there’s no shortage of examples.
